rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment neutrally describes an expectation ('expects to have more announcements').
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports expected announcements and does not contain an explicit calming cue.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation or statement of uncertainty/low risk.
The segment states the government expects more announcements on vaccines, describing a future possibility/communication plan.
